For anyone having a problem swapping disks here is what you do.

1) Download and use epsxe 1.7.0 and also download epsxe 1.6.0
(Best emulator out there)
You need to download the Bios and plugins including memory card plugins as well so see youtube if you don't know how (They both use the same plugins and Bios so just download install and copy/paste between the two)


2) Use 1.7.0 to play the game and save using the memory card plugin as close as you can to the disc swap part of the game.

3) copy/paste your memory card plugin folder from 1.7.0 to 1.6.0 to transfer the save game.

4) Run epsxe 1.6.0  and load the saved game and when it says "Change to disk (number)" push the escape key on your keyboard 'esc' on upper left corner.

5) Go to--> File/change disc/ ISO/ (Pick your disc number)

6) Change the disc and then save it using the internal memory card plugin.

5) Copy/paste back from 1.6.0 to 1.7.0

This process is due to the fact that 1.7.0 cannot change discs, but 1.6.0 can. 1.7.0 is much better to play on though due to glitches in the source of 1.6.0.
